ivory_route = {
wealth = 20			# Total base wealth of silk route
	trade_post_display_trigger = {
		OR = {
			province_id = 2626
			province_id = 2647
			province_id = 2650
			province_id = 2665
			province_id = 2672
			province_id = 2679
			province_id = 2690

			province_id = 2947
			province_id = 3682
			province_id = 3692
			province_id = 3701
			province_id = 4098
			province_id = 4114
		}
	}

	modifier = {			# How the trade route modifies the provinces it passes
		castle_tax_modifier = 0.04
		city_tax_modifier = 0.04
		temple_tax_modifier = 0.04
		tribal_tax_modifier = 0.04
		trade_route_value = 3
		local_movement_speed = 0.05
		tech_growth_modifier = 0.08
		icon = 61
	}

	start = {				# Start provinces of trade route
		2647
		2665
		2679
		4090
		3701
		2947
		2948
		2860
		2942
		2626
		2820
		2825
		2849
	}

	    4114 4112 2603 4109 4092 4091 4090 4106 4105 4099 4098 3902 3903 2665 3907 3682 3701 3918 3688 3679 4060 4059 3678 2671 2672 3920 2657 2658 2659 2655 2654 2647 2648 2627 2626 2623 2620 2619 2616 2617 2687 2688 2686 2692 2690 2676 2674 2680 2679 2678 2959 2951 2950 2948 2947 2949 2636 2635 2634 2944 2942 2940 2640 2628 2639 2641 2642 2706 2705 2704 2644 2645 2646 2650 2651 2653 2652 3919 2700 2696 2701 2819 2822 2697 2820 3921 2826 2827 2829 2830 2831 2825 2836 2837 2840 2841 3929 3960 2845 2846 2847 2849 3961 3962 2852 2853 2854 2856 2860
	}
    path = {
	    2860 2856 2854 2853 2852 3962 3961 2849 2847 2846 2845 3960 3929 2841 2840 2837 2836 2825 2831 2830 2829 2827 2826 3921 2820 2697 2822 2819 2701 2696 2700 3919 2652 2653 2651 2650 2646 2645 2644 2704 2705 2706 2642 2641 2639 2628 2640 2940 2942 2944 2634 2635 2636 2949 2947 2948 2950 2951 2959 2678 2679 2680 2674 2676 2690 2692 2686 2688 2687 2617 2616 2619 2620 2623 2626 2627 2648 2647 2654 2655 2659 2658 2657 3920 2672 2671 3678 4059 4060 3679 3688 3918 3701 3682 3907 2665 3903 3902 4098 4099 4105 4106 4090 4091 4092 4109 2603 4112 4114
